Others: Adem Bona played over 17 minutes, pulling down nine rebounds, scoring four points, blocking a shot, and was a -4 in the eight-point loss.
Nick Nurse praised Bona's performance, noting he didn't make many mistakes.
Bona credited his recent G League performance in Delaware for being ready for his NBA opportunity.
Bona mentioned staying ready every day to be prepared for any moment.
McCain and Bona share a close bond, attending chapel together and admiring each other.
